      • getRadioToCheck

        public static android.widget.RadioButton getRadioToCheck(java.lang.String text,
                                                         android.widget.RadioGroup radios)
        Reads the Radio Group to find the child that has text that matches the given text.
        Parameters:
        text - the text the desired child has
        radios - the radio group you are searching
        Returns:
        the first RadioButton whose text matches the given text, or null if none match.
